entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 5.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
